scripts.bootstrap: lerna exec 'rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json'; lerna bootstrap --hoist; patch-package
scripts.build-playground: mkdir -p packages/playground/static/packages; lerna run build-for-playground --parallel; lerna run build-playground
scripts.build: npm run bootstrap; npm run index; npm run quick-build
scripts.force-build: lerna run clean; npm run build
scripts.index: create-index -X ts -x ts -x tsx -Sui packages/ -c {}; npm run lint
scripts.lint: test $(tail -c1 package.json) && echo >> package.json; npm run lint-check -- --fix
scripts.open-errors: npm run quick-build | grep packages/ | sed -e 's/(.*//' | sort | uniq | xargs code
scripts.build-playground-prod: npm run force-build && npm run build-playground && node packages/playground/dist/server/buildProduction.js
